name: Skimming Canoe
description:
Skimming canoe is a fast-paced action game where your reaction time is key. The aim of the game is to survive as long as you can without getting hit buy the rocks to get the highest score possible. You can collect coins along the way which can be used in the shop to buy even more cool canoes. We have many game modes such as original, arena mode, practice and even a split screen 1v1 mode! 

TO GO FULL FULL SCREEN CLICK PLAY THEN THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON AT THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER OF THE GAME!!
